meanings.definition: Not engaging in betting or wagering.
meanings.sent1: She preferred nonbetting activities like reading and painting.
meanings.sent2: He was known for his nonbetting nature, always saving his money.
meanings.sent3: The nonbetting group of friends enjoyed playing board games instead.
meanings.sent4: Her nonbetting attitude towards risk-taking kept her financially stable.
meanings.sent5: The nonbetting policy at the school promoted a safe and responsible environment.

meanings.definition: The act of refraining from placing bets.
meanings.sent1: His nonbetting during the game surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: Nonbetting is common among those who prefer to save their money.
meanings.sent3: The nonbetting at the casino raised eyebrows among the regulars.
meanings.sent4: Her nonbetting was like a shield against the allure of gambling.
meanings.sent5: The nonbetting strategy paid off when the odds were not in their favor.
